text: array consisted of almost all known WW domains (115 domains) from mammalian proteins (and yeast). We prepared biotinylated peptides harboring either the EBOV VP40 WT PPxY motif (MRRVILPTAPPEYMEAI) or mutated PPxY motif (MRRVILP-TAAAEAMEAI). Both of the biotinylated peptides were fluorescently labeled and used to screen the specially prepared
